tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),Frozen Embryo Transfer,In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF),
review:
The fertility process is very intense emotionally, to say the least. Anxieties and expectations don't get the best out of us. When we decided to do the fertility treatment we were well aware of that. We knew that despite the way statistics looked, the process could go either way. After1 unsuccessful IVF and 2 failed Frozen embryo transfers in Canada, we felt quite disappointed. Thats when, one of our family members recommended Dr Simrandeep Kaur. 

Dr Simran is an outstanding professional and very hard working. She even sacrificed her Sunday mornings for us to make sure we are getting the very best treatment. She works tirelessly not just for us but for every other patient as well. The clinic is very well put together, the staff is very nice and supportive. 

Now My wife is 9 weeks pregnant and we are back in Canada. A very big Thank you to Dr. Simran and her team. Even though we are so far away from her but she is still available through various online channels to support us right away when we need to consult with her. 

I recommend Dr Simran 10000+ times. You will be in the best hands. Fertility treatment is the right mix of science and God's will. You can rely on Dr. Simran for the science part for sure! 

By God's grace we cant wait to welcome our new born!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. You have been a blessing to me and my family. Your support throughout my entire pregnancy made me go through this process smoothly without any hassle. Thankyou for always being there for all my worries and queries. Because of you today I am able to complete my family. Your hard work and kindness towards your patients will take you a long way. Wish you all the best and lots of success in your life. üôèüå∏

I recommend Dr. Simrandeep for any kind of Pregnancy related issues. She will give her 100% to solve your problem. Such a polite, kind and understanding Dr. I had ever met in my whole life. ‚ù§Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: * ***** *** ** **** ****** ** ***** *** *** ************ My wife was gone through 2 ectopic cases normally and 1 ectopic after ivf.. But When we met with Dr.Simran she said that there is hope that next pregnancy will be normal.. And we trust her and now after her treatment from Dr.Simran she is pregnant and pregnancy is not ectopic.. I am very thankful to her *** *** ***** ********* ****** *** *********** Main thing is that we consult with more than 20 doctors in last five year for ectopic preg problem.. But no one provide us solution..  But dr.simran disscused all history of my wife and she suggested us for special test ERA which was very helpful for our treatment.. Thanks Dr.Simran You are Realy next To God  for us

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My husband and I are beyond thankful for Dr. Simran. She is a wonderful, caring and kind doctor and is a blessing from God as she goes above and beyond everything we ever would have expected and will forever remain. After an year of trying on our own and going through other fertility Doctors, we had almost but given up on the ability of having children but Dr. Simran never gave up on us and continued to work with us *** ** **** ************** understanding and comforting.This year even through the pandemic and all the depression that was going on in the world, we were given a bright light at the end of the tunnel, when found out that we are pregnant. All thanks to Dr. Simran for making this happen. Words can‚Äôt express our gratefulness but our heart is.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Simrandeep Kaur is one gem of a person & one of the best doctor for infertility treatment. 
She gives proper time in understanding the problems & answering any queries. She is very polite & always in touch with her patients, she is just a phone call away, always reverts my queries even on whatsapp. By God‚Äôs grace & hard work of Dr. Simrandeep I have successfully conceived. I highly recommend Dr. Simrandeep Kaur for any type of gynae related issues including infertility treatments. You will be in the best and safe hands, she will definitely go an extra mile to help you. She is completely a package of God blessings in the form of doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Simran is very intelligent.. I feel very nice when i talk with her. I want to tell them that for me she is an angel.
After two ivf failure and 3 ivf which was cornual ectopic. I loose hope of becoming pregnant. I concerned to apollo fertility amritsar where they tell me to concern Dr. Simran Apollo fertlilty Delhi. When i talk to her first time i was full of hope she talks very positively and tell me for ERA test. I went delhi for my next treatment and she did it so well and her faith on god made me beleive on her.And after FET transfer i am pregnant which is normal not ectopic i am felling very blessed she is like an angel for me..Thank you so much Mam..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After having two IVF s failed, l was devastated and  left with no hopes. My friend had twin babies conceived through IVF from Dr Simrandeep and she insisted me to consult her. Doctors friendliness and caring attitude made me so comfortable and l had a ray of hope once again. She was so much peaceful, understood my case in detailed, advised a special test called ERA . After studying my case for few months and special tests she did my IVF and for the first time in my life my pregnancy test was positive! It was next to impossible, it had sort of become unreachable dream! Now am 8 weeks and still have a long way to go, can't watfor the special day. Mam you are a gem , l cannot thank you enough although you keep saying it's GOD who does everything. I recommend her to  everybody who are trying to get pregnant. Thank you mam,thankeyou so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr Simran on my friends advice. I was very frustrated as after visiting many doctors for five years l still wasn't able to conceive. I was in depression totally frustrated but in my friends insistance l went to her as my friend also had her baby through her. I finally met her eight months back. She was so gentle and patiently listened to our problems. She was never in hurry and gave us time and thoroughly studied our problem.  I am now five months pregnant , all thanks to her. I can't believe am pregnant, am so so indebted to her. Mam please continue this good work.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Simrandeep is just Truley blessing of babaji to me. I concieved aftr 5 yrs of struggle . My frnd recommended her coz she alos conceivd after long time with her only .. so i decided to visit there . And that was the best decision we made . I concieved within 5 months of their treatment . She's super friendly , keep in touch with her patients through her personal number.    Our blessings with her alwaysüôèüèª 

Regards
Pavneer kaur

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Simrandeep kaur is one the gem of apollo cradle moti nagar. She is very particular with what treatment she is providing to patient. Never keep in dark. Always genuine with patients. As I was misguided by other doctors but she gave me genuine suggestions and as well as treatment.
